metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17846 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The html package (aka x/net/html) through 2018-09-25 in Go mishandles
, leading to an infinite loop during an html.Parse call because inSelectIM and inSelectInTableIM do not comply with a specification.

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net-dev: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
